comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Her NYT Obituary was published on December 6, 1974 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10E14FD3C5B147B... She was chair of the New York City Mayor's Committee of Women on National Defense during WWI, but that was not formed until January 1918. See NYT of Jan 30, 1918 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F50816FD3B5B11738... In mid-1915, she would have been pregnant with twins. Twin sons, Randolph Apperson Hearst and David Whitmire Hearst, were born on Dec 2, 1915.
